1547720.name: RPG Maker MZ - Dignified Fantasy Music Vol. 1
1547720.description:
Looking for a way to add a little more sophistication and class to your fantasy projects? Look no further than Dignified Fantasy: Vol. 1!

Created by Bittersweet Entertainment, this audio pack includes a variety of orchestral themes that feature complex melodies and sounds. Take a sojourn into the world of fantasy and enjoy visiting cities filled with elves and fairies. Or jump into battle with force and fanfare. Dignified Fantasy: Vol 1 is a must-have for all fans of high fantasy settings.

Features:
  • 18 BGM themes.
  • 8 ME sounds.
  • Music suitable for a variety of fantasy settings.
  • .M4a and .OGG formats included.

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games
1547720.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
